title: Enhancing Nursing Practical Competencies: Information Literacy (IL) Diagnosis and Capacity-Building Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital information retrieval and evaluation skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply information credibility judgment criteria with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can compare and analyze information required for real-world scenarios from at least three sources and utilize it effectively.
Learners can establish and implement personalized improvement plans based on self-assessment results of information literacy skills.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
